actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an individual a deduction for amounts paid by him for the funeral expenses of certain related decedents.

summary.text: Allows an individual taxpayer, under the Internal Revenue Code, a deduction for amounts paid by him for the funeral expenses of specified related decedents.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an individual a deduction for amounts paid by him for the funeral expenses of certain related decedents.
